content: Thank you for creating such a comprehensive pitch deck at https://gamma.app/docs/PlayWise-The-AI-Powered-Educational-Toy-hj776lic1ghazb1?mode=doc. The market analysis and competitive positioning are exactly what we needed. The visual presentation of our adaptive learning system and parent dashboard really helps communicate our value proposition. This will be invaluable for our Kickstarter campaign and investor discussions.
